name: RPongG
description:
This COULD be the greatest RPG you've ever played!

The first time you face the Dragon will be hard as a mere human, Play again as a new character and gain treasures and get your revenge.

How to Play:

A/D or Arrow keys to move

Space to attack (can be held down)

Tab to pause the game and view stats

Move to the left or right to gain a treasure, you can only pick one. Be wary of stray attacks if you die, you can't receive either treasure.
